data.title: Mad Max [BLU_RAY]
data.meta_description:
Product description

NOTICE: The disk has Spanish audio and subtitles.

Synopsis

In a devastated near future, a biker gang controls the roads. Frightening innocent citizens while destroying the streets and mocking the police. But they underestimate one officer: Max Rockatansky (Mel Gibson), and when his best friend and his family are attacked, they drive him into a madness of revenge!
